definition: Xiamen, subprovincial city in Fujian/also known as Amoy
abbr. for Xiamen or Amoy 廈門|厦门[Xia4 men2], Fujian

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

sentences.english: Company is located in Tianfeng machinery area, Huli District, Xiamen City, Fujian, China.
sentences.chinese: 公司位於中國福建廈門市湖裏區天豐機械城。

sentences.english: The project of large frame overhead cross constructed by jacking method in Xianyue Road, Xiamen City has some unique characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 廈門市仙嶽路大型頂進框架立交橋工程具有一些特點。

sentences.english: Art work Cultivate won the creative prize in the 2nd Xiamen art Exhibition in 2000.
sentences.chinese: 2000年作品《耕》獲第二屆廈門市羣鷺獎創作獎。

sentences.english: 08 took a temporary post as Mayor Assistant of Xiamen, Fujian Province.
sentences.chinese: 1995年8月起在福建省廈門市掛職任市長助理。

sentences.english: Liu is the key organizer of a group that offers solace and advice in Xiamen, Fujian province.
sentences.chinese: 劉是福建省廈門市婦女安慰保護協會的組織者。

sentences.english: Xiang'an is the key farmland base of Xiamen.
sentences.chinese: 翔安區是廈門市主要農作物生產基地。

sentences.english: The Curent situation of social Sports in Xiamen City was investigated and researched in this Paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文對廈門市社會體育的現狀作了調查研究。

sentences.english: The paper introduces some experiences about business management in XiaMen ConstructionSafety Supervision Station.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了廈門市建築安全監督站進行行業管理的經驗。

sentences.english: This project is situated at north of Xiang'an District, Xiamen.
sentences.chinese: 該項目位於廈門市翔安區北側。

definition: Neipu township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
Siming district of Xiamen city 廈門市|厦门市[Xia4 men2 shi4] (Amoy), Fujian
Tainan city in Tainan county 臺南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
Xiangzhou district of Zhuhai city 珠海市[Zhu1 hai3 shi4], Guangdong
Jinjiang county level city in Quanzhou 泉州[Quan2 zhou1], Fujian
Zhanghua or Changhua county in west Taiwan
Kinmen County, Taiwan (the Kinmen or Quemoy islands off the Fujian coast)/Jinmen county in Quanzhou 泉州[Quan2 zhou1], Fujian
